quickstart.title: Cisco device logs
quickstart.header: Including routers, firewalls, switches and other appliances.

option.title: Consume logs from any Cisco device logging to syslog
option.summary: Use Splunk to consume any syslog data from a network source or a directory.

option.title: Get the Splunk for Cisco SDEE add-on
option.summary: This add-on collects logs from Cisco SDEE-compliant IDS over the network in real time.

option.title: Get other apps and add-ons for Cisco devices
option.summary: Technology-specific apps and add-ons help you get your data in, as well as provide reports and dashboards. Browse other Cisco apps on SplunkApps.

option.title: Forward Cisco device logs to this Splunk server from another server
option.summary: Use Splunk's universal forwarder to send Cisco device logs from any machine to your Splunk server.
